My Profile

Boaz Frazier-Bey

I am a Full-Stack Software Developer and Entrepreneur. I graduated from the University of Indianapolis with a Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology and received a Software Develoment Certification at The Iron Yard Indianapolis location. I enjoy using the MERN stack the most, as it allows for full development and even allows a seemless transition into building mobile apps. In my freetime, I love spending time with my son, traveling, watching movies, playing sports and lifting heavy weights. Here is my recent work experience.

Instacart

Full-Service Shopper

As a Full-Service Grocery Shopper for the city of Indianapolis, I have served the community, from Carmel to Greenwood, with top-notch front door delivery service.

Honda

Assembly Technician

As an offline Assembly Technician, I managed ten production manchines and employees as a first line of defense for preventing disruption to the completion of building Honda Civics and CRVs.

Menards

Front-Office Manager

As a Front-Office Manager of a large box hardware store, I managed 50 employees, from Cashiers to Security Guards, overlooked $100,000 on a daily basis, and provided industry leading customer service.
